name: Lawsuit - the law is in your hands (Canceled)
blurb: Live the life of a lawyer in a vast, open world city where you must rise to the top of your game - however you choose to play

rewards.reward:
Undergrad
============================== 
$1.53
============================== 
While we would love to take all our backers on a first class flight to New York - we have been advised against it. For £1 you get our sincere thanks for being awesome! Know that you are a part of this game with a personal, handwritten (well, typed) message from me telling you how amazing you are and access to our backer only forum where you can chat with other awesome people (including us!) Best of all, when the project is finished, you get the chance to know you helped make it happen.

P.S This hand written message comes with all tiers!

Student of Law
============================== 
$9.15
============================== 
Our sincere thanks with access to the backer only forum and you get the game for our special early bird price when it is released. Talk directly with us, give us your feedback and see the project as it evolves!

Associate
============================== 
$45.77
============================== 
Don't just have your name in the game, design a backstory and personality for your character that will dictate how they interact with the world. Will you obscure the player by doing anything to stop them winning a case or will you be a fair character serving for justice?

Lawyer
============================== 
$61
============================== 
Want to advertise how awesome you are? As well as having your name and backstory put into the game world (as in the Assosiate tier) show your awesomeness in the real world with either a kickstarter only 'I'm a lawyer' T-shirt or, another exclusive, our New york 'Justice Never Sleeps' T-shirt. You also get a copy of the game, a digital version of the soundtrack and access to the forum

Junior Partner
============================== 
$91.55
============================== 
Can't wait for your law degree? Get beta access to multiplayer while it is in development (with access to an exclusive part of the forum during that time) so you can be the first to try it out and give us feedback. You will also get one of our kickstarter only T-shirts, a digital OR physical version of the soundtrack and your name / personality in the game as a civilian.

Named Partner
============================== 
$122.06
============================== 
All the rewards from the 'Junior Partner' tier but now you can design your own case! Be it criminal or civil. Murder or merger. You get to design a side mission that we will add to our system so that the player can tackle it - be a criminal mastermind!

Law Firm Owner
============================== 
$152.60
============================== 
Thinking bigger than a side mission? Well how about writing a case, alongside us, for the main storyline. Write a case that every player will experience alongside your own twists and turns. Your own copy of the game, a physical OR digital version of the soundtrack, a T-shirt, access to the forum, beta multiplayer access and your name / backstory in the game are, of course, included.

New York City's finest
============================== 
$228.90
============================== 
Rival the player as you become part of our lawyer system - your name, your likeness and your backstory all dictating how your character will play in the game. Will he be the kind to commit perjury to  win a case or will he rely on his skills alone? Copy of the game, digital or physical soundtrack, T-shirt, beta multiplayer and access to the forum included.

Judge
============================== 
$305.16
============================== 
Combine "Law Firm Owner" with "New York City's finest" as you get added to our Lawyer system AND get to design your own case!

Supreme Court Judge
============================== 
$686.60
============================== 
In Lawsuit the player will get to choose which firm he would like to work for. For £450 you get to become the head lawyer for a rival firm that will be the players main adversary when they take on the largest cases. These are the most skilled and feared characters in the game. Face yourself with your own copy (as well as writing your own case for the game) and see your firm develop through the backer only forum. Digital or physical version of the soundtrack, multiplayer beta included with a T-shirt included.

District Attorney
============================== 
$1221
============================== 
Want to go further than being a part of the game? Be a part of the team with your name in the credits as producer and a direct line of communication with us - follow the development every step of the way. Oh and, for being unmeasurably awesome, become managing partner for one of the law firms in the game - meaning not only will you be the head of it, you will get to name it. See your own creation in your own copy of the game (with digital or physical version of the soundtrack), play with your firm or against it. Access to the forum included as always as well as a T-shirt.
